title: (Leaving Certificate 2021) (Accredited Grades) Act 2021 (No. 8 of 2021) shall
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Education (Leaving Certificate 2021)
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Education (Leaving Certificate 2021) 

(Accredited Grades) Act 2021 (Commencement) Order 2021.
text_norm: 1 order may cited education (leaving certificate 2021) (accredited grades) act 2021 (commencement) order 2021

title: (Leaving Certificate 2021) (Accredited Grades) Act 2021 (No. 8 of 2021) shall
heading: 2. The 2nd day of June 2021 is appointed as the day on which the Education
text_raw:
2. The 2nd day of June 2021 is appointed as the day on which the Education 
(Leaving Certificate 2021) (Accredited Grades) Act 2021 (No. 8 of 2021) shall 
come into operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

1 June, 2021. 

NORMA FOLEY, 

Minister for Education. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 4th June, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [268] 3
